metadata.Title: CVE-2014-6395 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in the dissector_postgresql function indissectors/ec_postgresql.c in Ettercap before 0.8.1 allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service or possibly execute arbitrary code via acrafted password length value that is inconsistent with the actual lengthof the password.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-6395` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ettercap-common - 1:0.8.1-3
ettercap-graphical - 1:0.8.1-3
ettercap-text-only - 1:0.8.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ettercap package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.8.1-3').
